website_summaries.verdict: The portable version of one the top brands in light therapy for a surprisingly low price.
pros: An inexpensive model in a durable, small design that's built for travel or use anywhere a full-size model won't fit
Emits bright light despite its compact size
cons: Gets a bit hot, especially with extended use
Rare incidents of broken bulbs upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: What a positive difference this lamp has made -
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this light for my 84 year old mother. She does not get out much and during winter we do not see the sun very much. What a difference this light has made in her disposition! We could tell a difference in the first day. After two days she was smiling, had much more energy, her attitude was better as was her mind function. She has joined in family activities (meals, holiday gatherings, Amazon movies (previously she would stay in her room &make excuses not to join in) The difference is night and day! Wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jon P

customer_reviews.title: still works great She is very happy with travel model
customer_reviews.text: Bought for girlfriend. I've had a larger one for several years.still works great She is very happy with travel model. Thank you Burt Johnson P.S. also like the fact is U.S. made
customer_reviews.author: Burt JohnsonAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It makes me feel way better when it's grim and dark and wintery. It's very bright, and just what I was looking for. I guess my cat missed the sun too, because she makes a point of lying in front of it when it's on, and it makes her less grumpy. Light therapy for elderly cats: highly recommended. Light therapy for people: also recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it works to make me happier, but I have it set up on a Christmas Tree Timer and use it as my alarm clock, because my window faces away from the sun in the morning. It's great to wake up to that! (My sound alarm goes off ~10 minutes after this just in case, but this usually wakes me up first.) The light works without issue and is a very bright white color (not yellow-white, or distinctly blue-white), which works well with my white walls in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Young Adult in a Big City

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years now. When I first started struggling with anxiety I was searching high and low for anything natural to use. I came across this and it has seemed to help tremendously. Especially during the winter months although I use it year round. This was my second time purchasing because I dropped the first one and it broke into numerous pieces. It was probably due for an upgrade anyway. I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for insomnia or seasonal depression.
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronic insomnia ever since I worked the graveyard shift at an old job and nothing helped- medication, meditation, exercise, etc, but this light has helped to reset my circadian rhythm and I'm finally getting to sleep quickly!! It does make me feel tired after using it for a short time but my physician has recommended I try using it longer than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Keep with me in my sad, dark cubical
customer_reviews.text: Really helps! Keep with me in my sad, dark cubical. It's also helped my plants stay alive in the cubical. As well as my soul.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Theis

customer_reviews.title: Happy Light with a cord
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see if I would feel better. I live in Washington state and work 5a-5p so I do not see the sun at all most of the year. For something that started as an experiment, I now love it. I use it everyday and the difference isn't huge but I do feel better. As an FYI to prospective buyers, it has a cord you plug in. I thought it would be battery powered.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this to make much of a difference, but the effect of the light is incredible. I live in northern Wisconsin where the winters are brutal, dark, and -35 degrees of get-me-out-of-here, so it's natural to feel a bit down in the winter. Spending 45 minutes or so a day in front of the light boosted my focus at work, helped me feel more awake, and drastically helped my sleep pattern. I wear a sleep tracker and there was a noticeable change in the quality of my sleep on days when I used the light. I was skeptical at first, but this really is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: TURNED ME INTO A MORNING PERSON
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for a couple of days but I'm loving the results! I am not a morning person, never have been. I put my happy light on my vanity and I turn it on while I'm getting ready in the morning. I feel much more refreshed and actually feel as if I can wear a smile on my face before noon!
customer_reviews.author: Natalee Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love this light...
customer_reviews.text: Love this light...small and very portable. As a long time Alaskan, it hasn't been till the fast few years I've experienced SAD, and though I've had it only a couple of days, I do know when I get up, have my coffee and turn on the laptop...to see that brightly shinning light just makes me feel better. Wish I would have considered this option earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Bzylady

customer_reviews.title: Great for S.A.D.
customer_reviews.text: I experience symptoms of S.A.D. in the winter, which lasts between 5-6 months here in Michigan. I've been using the lamp for 5 days and feel a marked difference already. My mood and energy levels are noticeably improved. I decided to bring my lamp to work and have been keeping it on between 4-6 hours each day, which I would highly recommend for folks who wake up in the dark and return home in the dark. Humans really are just house plants with more complex emotions.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: THE HAPPIEST LIGHT AROUND
customer_reviews.text: Listen, as someone who has seasonal affective disorder, it can be so hard to function in the winter when the days are so short. I have been feeling so tired and unable to focus in my classes. For the first time in weeks, I was able to pay attention to my lecture recordings and take great notes. Plus I don't feel constantly groggy because the light simulates day-time. I love this Happy Light. I think I'll name him Hank. Thanks, Hank.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: heard of the Happy Light and decided to try it out
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office with no windows and noticed how tired and down i became, heard of the Happy Light and decided to try it out.......it is wonderful!! I have more energy during that mid day slump and am happier at the end of the day! What a difference. I recommend for anyone working in an office with little or no natural sunlight!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Landa

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of my year, best winter I've had in years
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I tried this lamp. I use it in my office, just on the periphery of my vision. This was my first winter in years where I did not fight sleepiness and an urge to hibernate. I wish I found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Leihla B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp, I use it everyday at work and it has helped with winter blues and the long winters of Vermont. It helps my mood. It's bright but not too bright. I set it on my desk close to my keyboard. The price is great too, very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: carofaith

customer_reviews.title: Gets me going in the morning
customer_reviews.text: I live in Vermont and it can be quite dark in the summer. I turn this lamp on every morning as I am waking it up and it helps to get me going. Along with a good D3 supplement, it seems to keep me happier too! I've been recommending it to friends who are struggling with the winter doldrums.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M Shugart

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY (about) ‘Happy’ LIght
customer_reviews.text: Way WAY WAYYYY too bright. Like staring at the sun but worse! Afterwards all you see is dark spots. I don’t know why it doesn’t burn a hole in your retina! ~Not to mention that AFTER you get it, you learn per/instructions that for maximum benefits it must be held 4 -24 inches from your face! REALLY???!!! You can’t sit within 10 feet of it without feeling like someone’s pointing a POLICE SPOTLIGHT directly into your eyes. Dont waste your money or time. Very disappointed! ~If I could write a review with lesson one star that’s what it would’ve gotten... ZERO STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Leah C Zegouros (Celestial Readings)

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to rainy, overcast Seattle and I’ve been struggling with the gloomy weather. So dark all the time! I love this light, though. We (myself and 2 kids) use it in the morning while we’re having breakfast and I’ve seen a difference for all 3 of us in alertness and happiness. It reminds me of the feeling of waking up when I’m camping, how your brain feels awake even if you didn’t sleep well/are still physically tired. Feeling genuinely awake, especially when it’s still so dark outside, has done wonders for my energy level and mood. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Olds

customer_reviews.title: Might be more of a Placebo effect
customer_reviews.text: Really feels more like a placebo effect. I work in a cube farm without windows and wanted to just add some “pick me up” light and get some serotonin fix going but I’m not really seeing measurable effects. I don’t have S.A.D. as a medical condition and bought this light because I believe humans aren’t meant to work in enclosed light-deprived spaces and we need the sun to grow, stay healthy and feel energetic. So far...I don’t see a difference when I do use it vs. when I don’t. I keep it on my desk and point it away from my direct eyesight but angled at my eyes like the instructions said.
customer_reviews.author: madehak

customer_reviews.title: This light is the BEST $36 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I'm a 65 year old cna who works graveyard shift. This fall, I started having trouble sleeping during the day, then struggling all night long at work. This light is the BEST $36 I ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one for myself and two as gifts. Liked mine so much, I bought another one for my sister. I find it has made a difference. Now I can't wait to get my coffee in the morning and sit down in front of my lamp. If I get up and leave the lamp on, the dog gets in my spot in front of it!
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: It's a light bulb in box
customer_reviews.text: No magic bullet here; no positive effect on me. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Came in with bulb broken
customer_reviews.text: Came in today with bulb broken inside. Thankfully did not get cut by shattered glass like the other reviewers on here. Don't waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Horrorfanatic91

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this every single day since the moment I received it. Does it work? Yes. Yes. Yes. Some people think that's it's all in my head but I don't care. I have more energy, I feel healthier, I'm not sleepy during the day and my mood is definitely better.
customer_reviews.author: MayMay

customer_reviews.title: Helps Drab and Dark Winters
customer_reviews.text: My desk faces a wall with little access to windows. In the winter it's worse given the sun goes down so early. I turn this on in the morning to help wake me up first thing at work. In the afternoon I turn it on around 2/3 and has completely replaced my afternoon caffeine fix. Helps me be more alert at work and in better spirits in general. It is BRIGHT but it needs to be... and two others in my office have now purchased and recommended this after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: avro

customer_reviews.title: Helps me start my day off in a much better mood
customer_reviews.text: I am not a morning person at all, I bought this light to help me wake up on these gloomy winter mornings. It truly does help me pry myself out of bed in the morning! I leave it on my nightstand, flip it on after my alarm goes off, and just lay there for awhile while my body adjusts to the light. It starts my day off right and even helps me tolerate a little bit of talking before my coffee, if absolutely necessary! Super easy assembly, you just slide the front light screen in and bam, ready to use! Highly recommend for people that hate mornings.
customer_reviews.author: LakeLover215

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, way too bright
customer_reviews.text: Way too bright, this gave me a headache within minutes, even when it was across the room. Returned within a day. I was very unhappy with the happy light.
customer_reviews.author: essjay

customer_reviews.title: not a fan of the design... awkward to use
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would work out well but have to say I am not impressed at all. The design is awkward and hard to use. The light is glaring so it isn't relaxing and actually uncomfortable to use. I have only used it a few times since I bought it and would not recommend this to my friends. Spend more and get a better design than this. I wasted my money on it and don't want you to make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: shelly k.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of light for its size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on the recommendation of my doctor (for SAD). It puts out a good amount of light. Seems to use a proprietary light bulb and I haven't checked to see how much those are but hopefully the current one will last a long time. If I had to change one thing on the lamp, I would make a better stand for it. The stabilizers on the base don't stick out very far and it does not take a lot to tip it over. Just a caveat for anyone with kids/pets around.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Drake

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bulb is already dying and I’ve only had the light for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I think this is working. Since getting it I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is working. Since getting it I've had more energy and started working out again. Plus if you put it in front of a mirror you can see ALL your pore and eyebrow hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Holly K.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I have felt a touch of SAD at the winter time change for years, but never enough to get me totally down. Enter this year. I would start sobbing at sundown and cry on and off until I went to bed :( so I knew I had to do something. From the moment I turned this light on things changed! It now lives on my kitchen counter and goes on when I start making breakfast, stays on at least an hour, and has completely changed my mood in less than 48 hours! Can't believe I never invested in a happy light before, but I am a total believer now.
customer_reviews.author: Ardent

customer_reviews.title: Worthless for its intended purpose - light therapy
customer_reviews.text: Marketed as a "happy" light, this manufacture leads you to believe that this light is suitable for mood-elevating, light therapy. It is not. It is no better than an ordinary corded light that you might buy for a fraction of the cost at a retail department store. Anybody, who rates this lamp as 5-stars, must be clueless about what a light-therapy lamp should be. That is why a real light-therapy lamp costs $300 or more. Anything that sells for under $50, such as this light, is worthless by comparison; and you are just fooling yourself to suppose otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Apoiuwerhpga

customer_reviews.title: Burned pastic smell/gets dangerously hot
customer_reviews.text: The manual says it has to stay on for an hour to be effective in helping with low seratonin levels. I'm surprised that the bulb looks like a regular lightbulb..nothing different. The only complaint I have is it gets too heated up (takes less than an hour) and starts to give off a burned plastic smell :( It gets so hot that I'm scared it could start a fire! Wish I could have returned it and got a safer option.
customer_reviews.author: sara del

customer_reviews.title: you can't find a better light. I've recommended it to all my co-workers
customer_reviews.text: This little light does wonders! I work in a windowless library under awful fluorescent lights. I would be awake and alert until I came to work, then I would be drained of all energy. After buying this and putting it on my desk, I've noticed a huge difference in my awakeness and alertness. For $30, honestly, you can't find a better light. I've recommended it to all my co-workers, and even my husband. Why not just try it for $30?
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as pricier models
customer_reviews.text: This little light is a powerhouse! It's worked wonders on my SAD and circadian rhythms. I plugged it into a cheap timer and set it to turn on right before I need to wake up, so I get a few minutes of the "sun" in my eyes before my alarm goes off. Works perfectly for considerably less money than the expensive lamps with built-in timers. It's pretty sturdy, too. I accidentally knocked it off the table one morning (don't judge, we've all been there) and it was completely fine when I finally got up and rescued it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura SC

customer_reviews.title: Bright and compact.
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped with my seasonal depression, and considering I live in Seattle, it was really looking bleak. It's so bright!!! I also take a vitamin d3 supplement and use this on days I work from home. Definitely gets warm so watch for overheating and don't leave it on for longer than you're using it.
customer_reviews.author: TheCorgiReview

customer_reviews.title: This light is VERY bright....distractingly so
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light because I suffer from SAD (Seasonal Affected Disorder) and I work inside. I can't really say if it has helped because I honestly can't work with it on--it's SO bright (white light, not soft yellow light) that it's harsh to the eye and it is super distracting. I've tried placing things in front of it to block the glare, but I think that's probably defeating the purpose of what the light is supposed to be doing for me? Needless to say, it hasn't helped me--but then again, I can't use it regularly like instructions say too. I wish there was a dimmer on it. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cardinali

customer_reviews.title: Great for me, not my mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly Mom who hasn't been sleeping well. However after two days she is so adverse to using it that I'll use it myself. I have the larger version on my desk and use it twice daily and am very happy with mine. Her complaints were the light was too bright and affected her ability to see TV. My observation was she kept looking at the light even though I asked her not to. I'm a believer in the benefits, just recognizing my Mom is at a point this tool won't work for her.
customer_reviews.author: K. Plaster

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my seasonal depression.
customer_reviews.text: This light has helped so much with my seasonal depression! And ever since I started using it everyone keeps telling me I look like I’m glowing and asking me what I have been doing. I don’t know if it’s the light for sure but I just seem happier and my skin looks healthier. It’s bright too! I sit it at and angle as I read my book in the morning before I go to work. Be sure to read the instructions too to properly use it. I love it! Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for the boyfriend. I didn't realize ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the boyfriend. I didn't realize before I bought it that it has a florescent bulb, or that it comes with the bulb not installed, you have to install the bulb, put the unit together, and screw it together with the included screwdriver. That said, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Farrell

customer_reviews.title: other than to look at my TV screen for the rest of the time that I live and breathe that it's difficult to make time to Blind myself and get that sweet sweet vitamin D
customer_reviews.text: It's works as well as it's supposed to if any of us would actually take the time to stare at it for 20 minutes. It's so hard to look away from my phone for more than 2 minutes, other than to look at my TV screen for the rest of the time that I live and breathe that it's difficult to make time to Blind myself and get that sweet sweet vitamin D. It's not actually that blinding , and you just have to have it in your peripheral. It's a good product and it's a lot more compact than some other models I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Cerebraxis Terecrux

customer_reviews.title: Helps with energy, mood and depression
customer_reviews.text: After using this lamp every single day for 5 years, it finally broke. I ordered a new one immediately. I will never be without this lamp. It gives me good energy in the morning and helps lift my mood. It is truly an incredible product and I am super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: flower power

customer_reviews.title: too much use--hyper mania
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the ease of use. Seemed fine at first, then I became very hyper, with severe anxiety. Didn't use it too often or too long at a time. This definitely can have a negative effect. I sent one back and haven't used the other again.
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!! And Helps!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from SAD Seasonal Affective Disorder. Basically that means I need more sun that most people, or I get bummed out. This light solves that condition when I spend to much time indoors or its grey and cloudy out. It does work, it is very bright so take head with the instructions and adjust accordingly. Worth every penny and it makes a great gift to anyone you might know who has this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Chriselle V

customer_reviews.title: Helping regulate my sleep and energy
customer_reviews.text: 2 months of steady use and I definitely feel a difference. I don't have SAD, but I have post-traumatic stress and my energy levels had been low and my anxiety spiked. My sleep was off and I was constantly tired and needing a nap. I'm back on schedule and feeling I have some increase in energy and decrease in anxiety. Paired with melatonin, I feel it has been completely worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Scraggledy IG

customer_reviews.title: SAD has met its match!!  Love this light!!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a Dr where I work in not so sunny Oregon had one of these in her desk. Anything called a happy light was something I needed to try. I’m a convert!! I put it in my nightstand the first night and could feel myself relaxing. I left it on for about an hour while I read. Next night same thing. Best of all I slept until my alarm went off which never happens. I have insomnia and severe seasonal affective disorder. I couldn’t wait to come home tonight and turn it on. It does something magical somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Adair

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than i thought, but nice
customer_reviews.text: Unit was less portable than i imagined. However it is very well made, and i really like it. Works just fine at home and wouldn't be a bear to transport. Would easily fit in a backpack. Height is maybe around 8". Quite happy with it. Morning exposure helps my sleep patterns. I like to use it in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: uber_neko_zero

customer_reviews.title: Great little buy!
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have a feature for mounting....I rigged up a system next to my vanity for when I'm getting ready in the morning. As long as you're creative...no worries. I just don't sit down much...let alone in one spot for 20 min. ;) but still very happy with it! Seems well made and quod quality. Even loved the customer service and their little story. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Good for my dark mornings
customer_reviews.text: Useful light for those of us that get up for work in the middle of the night and hardly ever see the sun. Sitting in front of it while sipping my tea really helps wake me up to drive to work and really helps reset my internal clock so I can sleep better once in ready for bed. Also great for keeping seasonal affected disorder at bay for those darker winter days. I don't start my day without it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Owens

customer_reviews.title: I love this "HappyLight" lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Even if this Verilux HappyLight lamp doesn't make me a "happy" person, I still love it! I'm using it while I put on my make up as it provides plenty of light so that I can actually see what I'm doing. I will -absolutely- update my review when and if I start telling a difference in my mood, as I have been struggling with depression since my mother's passing and after a failed surgery that has left me -hopefully temporarily- disabled. I'm using it to improve my vitamin D absorption, as well, since my last lab work showed a deficiency of it. Won't know if it's working for that until my next lab work is done.
customer_reviews.author: ACHA

customer_reviews.title: ... what the research says on these but I really enjoy it. IF anything I can trick myself into ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the research says on these but I really enjoy it. IF anything I can trick myself into thinking I'm somewhere sunny when its cloudy out. I have owned this for about 6 months and use it maybe weekly, haven't had any issues. Good size to sit on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: jlevy

customer_reviews.title: Happy Light
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from seasonal depression and needed something to help me out. I'm not a fan of medication and prefer a more natural way. I bought this and it really helps. Suggestions do not use in a small space it is a small light but it is very bright. Don't look directly into either. No one even have to know what it is use for I put it in the room on your choice and turn it on we all can use a little lift me up.
customer_reviews.author: Moody Family

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this years ago! I have it on during breakfast and I think it makes a huge difference for my seasonal affective disorder and it really helps me wake up in the morning, even more so than my coffee. I definitely notice a difference in how alert and awake I feel in the morning compared to when a don't use it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: nsweet1

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with S.A.D.
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended one of these to combat Seasonal Depression in the winter months. I keep it at my desk at work and it seems to have helped. It has also seems to bother my coworker, but that is his problem :-)
customer_reviews.author: M Eschbacher

customer_reviews.title: Brightens my day
customer_reviews.text: This light was referred to me by my doctor. It's great for those gloomy days and seasonal depression. I sit in front of it while I work, read or craft. I highly recommend this light
customer_reviews.author: Kristi K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy light
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this brand of light for me to help with SAD, she say it may help. It will only work if you use it every day, which I am not consistent enough with since it’s hard for me to sit still for 30 min in the morning with a bright light near my face, but it doesn’t hurt to try.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Very 'Happy' with my purchase. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy to unpack/ set up. A few reviews mentioned the base being unstable or not balanced, I don't see this problem. Sat it on a small plant stand in the corner of the den. Last several days have been rainy with overcast sky's. This little light is like a window of sunshine. Very pleased with my purchase, especially the price. Only surprise is how attracted my cats are to it. They like to sleep with their backs to the light when it's on. Happy cats, happy family, lol.
customer_reviews.author: B.Beck

customer_reviews.title: Helped with sleeping issues a great deal
customer_reviews.text: People complain about the switch in the back and yeah it's kind of annoying because you pretty much have to look directly at the light to turn it off, unless you flip it over it walk around the back. Either way, for the price it doesn't bother me at all. Also my sleep cycle is actually better regulated after having used it for a while. I'd say I felt that benefit within a week. I am not quite as grumpy as usual during the winter and not as sluggish either. I'd recommend this product for anyone who has sleeping or energy troubles in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Compact, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I used this lamp at my computer desk as I wanted a more targeted beam against my keyboard instead of relying on my roof light. It was perfect and I like the fact that the bulb is easily replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Laurianne B.

customer_reviews.title: Experienced headache
customer_reviews.text: Bought since read so many good things of how this type of light would help with SAD ( seasonal depression). I followed directions and after trying several times had to stop using only after using less than 3 minutes since I got a headache. I had to return. I am very sensitive to things.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin48

customer_reviews.title: Too bright
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I know this is meant to simulate sunlight and give you Vitamin D, so I should have expected it to be bright. But it's really bright!! You can't really use it while you are doing anything else, because you can't see anything while you are using it. You would have to just sit in front of it. I tried it once, but have not used it since. I gave it 2 stars, because the quality of the machine is probably fine! It's a good compact size. But just not practical for me to fit in during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Short term energy, longer mood lifting!
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I have fibromyalgia and narcolepsy, so finding a way to increase energy for me is very difficult. I hope I can change my review in the future because it might be too early to assess the efficacy of the light. However, I do notice a short period of energy after using it. I've been more peppy, to a small degree, first thing after using it, but that energy seems to fade by early afternoon. (But, I've had a cold since shortly after it arrived). My mood, on the other hand, is greatly improved throughout the day, into late afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: AmeeNae

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Two things: 1. I’ve been using it as directed, but I’m really not sure it’s doing anything for me. I don’t feel more energized at all. But it might just be me, and not the product. 2. The top part comes off very easily. I guess it makes it easier to change the bulb, but you have to be very careful when picking the light up so the top doesn’t come off, and you don’t drop it. I ended up taping it down after almost dropping the light several times.
customer_reviews.author: BRM

customer_reviews.title: Essential at my latitude
customer_reviews.text: I'd had one of these for a year, but didn't realize just how much it was helping me until I loaned it to a neighbor. Boy, did I miss my daily dose of "daylight"! Had to buy myself another in order to cope with the lack of sunshine through the late Autumn and Winter months. It really helps me avoid depression. I am not a doctor, just a person who needs more sunshine than nature provides sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Midwest Winters
customer_reviews.text: I moved up to NE Ohio last summer from sunny GA. A coworker recommended that I get a "happy lamp" to help with the grey winters. I have kept this lamp on my desk at work and used it in the mornings for 15 minutes ever hour until noon. It did help with the lethargy and depression. I could tell which days I did not use it because I found myself goofing off on my phone or not getting work done. The lamp works well, was easy to assemble and I have had no issues with it after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT enough light
customer_reviews.text: This light doesn't have enough BTU's per recommended by physicians so you would need to use it almost an hour a day vs a higher light which is the same price ..I didn't realize it until after I opened it.. My fault :)
customer_reviews.author: AliciaM

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this light when he was in his second year of college. I did get it for him but wondered every now and then if it worked. I finally asked him two days ago. His eyes lit up and he said, "Oh, yeah, it works good. I wish I would have brought it with me." The weather has been gloomy so I guess it would have helped him to be more awake at home With his positive reply, I think I'll get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Brighten up your day
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few days. Bright light helps ease the drudgery of daylight savings. Have noticed a brighter mood when using this earlier in day. Feel less tired as well. Seems there is something to it after all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday. Easy to set up, easy to turn on. Its really bright! I work in an basement office with one little window and suffer from some seasonal depression ( along with regular depression ) from time to time. I have been wanting to get one of these for a while. Ive used it a couple of times and within 10-15 minutes of using it, it almost feels like being in the sun. It needs to be closer to your face than you would think, even though its bright. They recommend it be placed within a few feet of your face. I'm excited to use it during those winter months that feel like they never end.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Laubacker

customer_reviews.title: Happy light...does what it says on the tin!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first regarding light therapy in general. However, living in New England and having such dim and cloudy weather I was willing to give it a try. The portable happy light from Verilux is wonderful! I got it and immediately started using it at home. I liked it so much that I brought it to work and am starting to use it there. I may even get a second one to have at both places. I am a very pleased customer!
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: I could’ve pointed a flashlight at myself to accomplish what this thing does.
customer_reviews.text: What does this thing even do? They want it two feet in front of my face, when it’s already bright enough several feet away on the floor. It just seems like they want me to shine a bright light in my eyes so I can go blind.
customer_reviews.author: Darren A.

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic turned Believer
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical. However, after using it for a week (15 mins a day) I did notice a big difference in my SAD. Even got my hubby using it during our long long winters.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Couple

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who work in offices without windows!
customer_reviews.text: Work sucked. Work sucked even more when I didn't have a window. Can you imagine working every day in a room without a window between late-fall and mid-spring? You never see the light of day (and your Vitamin D level goes down)! What's the weather? Is it snowing? Enter the HappyLight: Just a little time during the day helps lift your spirits. I highly recommend! Warning: This will NOT make work better for you if you are unhappy. there The only way to fix that is to find another job.
customer_reviews.author: Woohoo15

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about trying this, but it really does help! I notice an increase in energy when I use it on dark days when usually I just want to lay around all day. Be aware the top part gets hot from the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not CHEAP lol
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LITTLE LAMP!!! I have had seasonal depression ever since I moved back to Michigan (although, it could just be the State of Michigan causing the depression...) Regardless, this little lamp is LIFESAVER. They recommend an hour a day but idgaf I leave it on all morning in my office, with no windows, and it's only been a few days but I notice the difference. I feel more awake and less hungry oddly, so idk what it does but it works for me. Plus, it's a steal! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lee_Mari

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far...
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me as aid in combating depression. I had to do a minimal amount of assembly when the light arrived, but it was no problem. The light is very bright, and I do not put it directly at my face, maybe 1 foot away and to the side. I am still adjusting to using the light, but my mood has seemed to improve since using it. I am pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good Light
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I chose this light. It is sturdily built and provides a suitable amount of light to assist me in weathering the shorter day lengths and cloudy skies of winter.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C Wrenn

customer_reviews.title: Really helps
customer_reviews.text: I got this months ago, when I was working 18 hour days in a basement office. At the time, I was feeling depression and was advised on many lifestyle changes. That takes time, so I picked this up as something I could do right away. I felt a difference in a matter of hours. That made some of the other life changes possible. Not with the shelter in place order, I’m again feeling down and in no small part because I don’t have access to any safe outdoor space. My HappyLight helps me maintain a regular sleep schedule and seems to keep my Vitamin D consistent. As a bonus, my houseplant seems to like it too
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: I love, love, love my Happy Light!!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as promised, well packaged, and all I had to do is remove it from the box and install the light bulb in place. I sat it on my printer, next to my computer and turned it on. The bright light worked for me and friends commented on my upbeat mood within a few days. I know this sounds funny, but I am looking forward to next winter so I can be with my little light. :-)
customer_reviews.author: dylans_busha

customer_reviews.title: Toxic blue light
customer_reviews.text: Full spectrum bulbs are nothing like daylight, they're mostly blue light which is toxic to human vision. This lamp does not give off UV radiation, which is what your skin requires to make vitamin D. There's no science supporting full spectrum therapy. It's just a lamp
customer_reviews.author: tim tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this late last winter, so didn't use it much until this Fall. I turn it on every morning early, on gloomy days. I find it works better sitting on a table, a little behind me, and shining from behind. You aren't really supposed to look at it. It helps me wake up and does seem to help my mood.
customer_reviews.author: B. R. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Helps out in winter months
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and discovered it made a difference in my seasonal issues. Then my daughter "borrowed it." So I bought a second. And now I'm buying a third for my father. It helps out in the winter months and makes a difference. I set it up on the desk next to my work station & make sure its not shining in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J OKeefe

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I moved from Arizona to Seattle 3 years ago and adjusting to the winter was ROUGH. I struggle with anxiety and depression as is, but in the winter my mood was so low. I finally bought this light and used it consistently last winter. I felt like it really made a difference in my energy and mood, and just helped me wake up during dark mornings. I set it on a stack of books so that it is level with my face and would use it in the mornings for about 30 minutes while eating breakfast. It is small and lightweight, so easy to store during the brighter months.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Small but impactful
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! As an individual that lives in the north of the US but is originally from the south, getting adjusted to the short days and lack of sun was a hard challenge. This light is just small enough that I can use it when at my desk but still bright enough to help mimic the actual sun. Overall great buy.
customer_reviews.author: emchoff

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I never really bought into light therapy ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I never really bought into light therapy. She does suffer from SADs and all I can say is that after 2 days, she was a different person. So helpful. Wintertime lifesaver for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Del & Steph

customer_reviews.title: It's a good price and quality made item.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. I like the size because it fits right on my desk. Very compact. I also carry it back and forth to work with me, and it slides right into my shoulder bag. It seems pretty sturdy, and I'm pleased with an overall. I think I have noticed a little more energy in the mornings, but I suffer from chronic fatigue syndrome. It's a nice light, and it doesn't hurt my eyes while I'm working on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for employees
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these for my employees because there isn't any outside light in their office space. They are using them still months later. I don't know if it is legit or not, but they definitely seem to enjoy the lights especially on days when the weather is gloomy or even in difficult times.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T. Wain

customer_reviews.title: Small, but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Do not let the size of this light fool you. The light is very bright, very powerful- and sitting by it for about 5-10 minutes creates this sort of light, "buzzy" feeling. It is a good feeling! I bought it for my boyfriend who has seasonal and he feels that the light does help soothe some of his feeling of being down during this gray time of year. This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several and given them as gifts. It has made a world of difference in the lives of those that are important to me. A physician I work with bought some for his and friends. I told a company about them, they bought some for their employees. I wish I had purchased stock in this company. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: A great way to wake up before sunrise.
customer_reviews.text: Pair with a smart plug and its a great way to wake up before the sun rises.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Big help
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom during the dark winter months. It helped, but she kept forgetting to use it. Would like to see an alarm on it that can be set to go off every day at a specific time.
customer_reviews.author: Kech56

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: I received my Happy Lamp only one hour ago and I am already using it. I've got to say that it is indeed making me every happy and I love it. This was a very wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 83 year old mom who is vitamin D deficient and slightly depressed especially in the winter. I just got it for her for Christmas so we haven't used it long but it seems to work a little. She doesn't get outside as much as she should so I thought this could be a solution for additional light from the comfort of her easy chair. She uses it for 30 minutes morning and evening. I'm hoping with more time it will help her mood. This model is smaller than the others but puts off a lot of bright light. The price was affordable and it's easy to move from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: The Best Thing Since Sliced Bread
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has god-like powers. I never write reviews for ANYTHING but it’s so dope that I had to. I suffer from extremely intense seasonal affective disorder and this has helped more than anything else I’ve tried. Within two minutes I could already feel the hashtag seasonal depression fading away. It’s so compact that I just put it in my backpack before heading out for the day. If you suffer from SAD order this lamp!!! It’s life changing.
customer_reviews.author: McCaulee Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: THE LIGHT DOES NOT SEEM TO CREATE EXCESSIVE HEAT ON THE SKIN WHEN USED WITHIN THE RECOMMENDED DISTANCE AND FOR THE TIME LIMITATION
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT WORKS WELL & HAS A VERY BRIGHT LIGHT. VERILUX STRESSES PROTECTING THE EYES WHICH MEANS THE DIRECTION OF THE LIGHT HAS TO BE CONTROLLED AT ALL TIMES. ALTHOUGH VERY BRIGHT, THE LIGHT DOES NOT SEEM TO CREATE EXCESSIVE HEAT ON THE SKIN WHEN USED WITHIN THE RECOMMENDED DISTANCE AND FOR THE TIME LIMITATION. IT WILL TAKE TIME TO EVALUATE ANY POSITIVE OR HAPPY AFFECT ON THE USER. NUMBER 1: IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO PROTECT OUR EYES. FROM GMCMEF
customer_reviews.author: GMCMEF

customer_reviews.title: Great light for all day
customer_reviews.text: This is not the brightest light, but that's what is good about it. You can put it on your desk and have it going all day without hurting your eyes. It's nice and small but stands up well on it's own. I also have another, brighter happy light but this one is my favorite because my office at work is in a basement without windows.
customer_reviews.author: Altered Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a good morning.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this consistently now for over a month. It's so useful in getting my energy going for the morning. I can always tell when I haven't been able to spend time in front of it in the morning. I love that I can stick it in my big work bag and take it to and from work to home. I've also used it in the afternoon at times for a pick me up instead of caffeine and it's great at that too.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Best price, helps with depression
customer_reviews.text: So very easy to set up and use. This is a blessing for anyone that has seasonal depression. Also cannot beat the price. Have purchased 2 others for friends and family with seasonal depression.
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: Verilux HappyLight VT10 Compact Personal, Portable Bright White Light 10,000 Lux Therapy Lamp with 20 sq. in. Lens Size
feature_bullets: USA BASED - Verilux, with over 60 years as your Healthy Lighting Company, is the creator of the original HappyLight brand with live customer support located in Vermont.
UV-FREE, FULL SPECTRUM LIGHT - Delivers up to 10,000 lux (light level) intensity for effective light therapy. Lens dimension: 20 sq in.
EASY TO USE, COMPACT DESIGN - Simple on/off button makes operation easy. Smaller size ideal for frequent, longer session times and perfect for desktop or kitchen table.
IMPROVE SLEEP, MOOD, FOCUS, ENERGY - Bright light from the HappyLight Compact light therapy lamp provides signals to the body to help you feel energized, focused, and revitalized.
SAFE AND NATURAL LIGHT THERAPY - Non-invasive and drug-free; perfect for office workers, seniors, shift work, jet lag, insomnia, and sunlight deprivation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
